title: Practically Perfect
description: Anna, a newly qualified interior designer, decides to risk everything on buying a tiny but adorable cottage so she can renovate it, sell it, and prove to her family that she can earn her own living. But the cottage interior isnâ€™t the only obstacle she has to face; the other one is the arrival of Rob Hunter who puts up more obstacles than the Grand National.From the Trade Paperback edition.
author: Katie Fforde
